TC01.SQL: DECLARE @DATETIME_ID varchar(100)=DATETIME_VALUE , @SN varchar(200) =UNIQUE_ID_VALUE  select CAST(ROUND(avg(KPI_Value), 2) AS NUMERIC(36,2)) AS kpiValue from (SELECT DATETIME_ID, (100*(((SUM(DC_E_RAN_UCELL_RAW.PMNORABESTABLISHATTEMPTSPEECH)-SUM(DC_E_RAN_UCELL_RAW.PMNORABESTATTEMPTMULTISPEECH))/SUM(DC_E_RAN_UCELL_RAW.PMNORABESTABLISHATTEMPTSPEECH))*(SUM(DC_E_RAN_UCELL_RAW.PMTOTNORRCCONNECTREQCSSUCC)/(SUM(DC_E_RAN_UCELL_RAW.PMTOTNORRCCONNECTREQCS)-SUM(DC_E_RAN_UCELL_RAW.PMNOLOADSHARINGRRCCONNCS))*(SUM(DC_E_RAN_UCELL_RAW.PMNORABESTABLISHSUCCESSSPEECH)-SUM(DC_E_RAN_UCELL_RAW.PMNORABESTSUCCESSMULTISPEECH))/(SUM(DC_E_RAN_UCELL_RAW.PMNORABESTABLISHATTEMPTSPEECH)-SUM(DC_E_RAN_UCELL_RAW.PMNORABESTATTEMPTMULTISPEECH)))+((SUM(DC_E_RAN_UCELL_RAW.PMNORABESTATTEMPTMULTISPEECHURA)/SUM(DC_E_RAN_UCELL_RAW.PMNORABESTABLISHATTEMPTSPEECH))*(SUM(DC_E_RAN_UCELL_RAW.PMNOCELLUPDATESUCCMULTICS)/SUM(DC_E_RAN_UCELL_RAW.PMNOCELLUPDATEATTMULTICS))*(SUM(DC_E_RAN_UCELL_RAW.PMNORABESTSUCCESSMULTISPEECHURA)/SUM(DC_E_RAN_UCELL_RAW.PMNORABESTATTEMPTMULTISPEECHURA)))+((SUM(DC_E_RAN_UCELL_RAW.PMNORABESTATTEMPTMULTISPEECH)-SUM(DC_E_RAN_UCELL_RAW.PMNORABESTATTEMPTMULTISPEECHURA))/SUM(DC_E_RAN_UCELL_RAW.PMNORABESTABLISHATTEMPTSPEECH))*((SUM(DC_E_RAN_UCELL_RAW.PMNORABESTSUCCESSMULTISPEECH)-SUM(DC_E_RAN_UCELL_RAW.PMNORABESTSUCCESSMULTISPEECHURA))/(SUM(DC_E_RAN_UCELL_RAW.PMNORABESTATTEMPTMULTISPEECH)-SUM(DC_E_RAN_UCELL_RAW.PMNORABESTATTEMPTMULTISPEECHURA))))) AS KPI_Value FROM DC_E_RAN_UCELL_RAW where DATE_ID = @DATETIME_ID  AND  SN=@SN GROUP BY DATETIME_ID ORDER BY DATETIME_ID ASC) A

TC02.SQL: DECLARE @DATETIME_ID varchar(100)=DATETIME_VALUE , @SN varchar(200) =UNIQUE_ID_VALUE select CAST(ROUND(avg(KPI_Value), 2) AS NUMERIC(36,2)) AS kpiValue from (SELECT DATETIME_ID, (AVG(VS_LEM_TX_KBS)) AS KPI_Value FROM DC_E_CSCF_OSMDEVICE_RAW where DATE_ID = @DATETIME_ID AND SN=@SN GROUP BY DATETIME_ID ORDER BY DATETIME_ID ASC) A

TC03.Measure: Average Usage of Downlink PRB Capacity
TC03.SQL: DECLARE @DATETIME_ID varchar(100)=DATETIME_VALUE' , @SN varchar(200) =UNIQUE_ID_VALUE select CAST(ROUND(avg(KPI_Value), 2) AS NUMERIC(36,2)) AS kpiValue from (SELECT DATETIME_ID, SUM(PMLICDLPRBUSEDSUM)/SUM(PMLICDLPRBUSEDSAMP) AS KPI_Value FROM DC_E_ERBS_BBPROCESSINGRESOURCE_RAW where DATE_ID = @DATETIME_ID AND SN=@SN GROUP BY DATETIME_ID ORDER BY DATETIME_ID ASC) A
